mapper.insert: insert into shop_user (username, password, name, gender, phone, nickname, zipcode, address, birthday, joindate) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{nickname}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{birthday}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop_user WHERE username = #{username} AND password = #{password}
SELECT verify FROM shop_user WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT username FROM shop_user WHERE name=#{name} AND phone=#{phone}
SELECT password FROM shop_user WHERE username=#{username} AND name=#{name}
SELECT username, name FROM shop_user WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT id_count,username,role FROM shop_user_role WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.update: update shop_user set name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address = #{address}, birthday = #{birthday ,jdbcType=DATE} where username=#{username}
